name: Paper Sorcerer
description: This is the Wine+GOG version. You need to provide the GOG windows installer

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/PaperSorcererPC.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES '/DIR=C:/game'
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    description: Installing MSVC 2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
